tutorial.msg:ko: 오른쪽 깃발로 이동하여 　'엄마가 보물을 숨겨요'를 　　완료하면
tutorial.msg:en: Go to the flag on the right and complete 'Hide your treasure' stage,
then you can go to the next stage

tutorial.msg:ko: 가상 키보드를 이용하여 엄마를 움직일 수 있어요
tutorial.msg:en: you can move 'Mom' character by virtual keyboard
If you press '↑' Button, Mom will move up
If you press '↓' Button, Mom will move down
If you press '→' Button, Mom will move right
If you press '←' Button, Mom will move left

goal.msg:en: Go to the Flag on the right
